mapper.select: SELECT IDX ,PACKAGE AS PACKAGENAME ,TITLE FROM PLAYSTOREAPPINFO WHERE IDX > #{startidx} LIMIT #{pagecount}, #{size}

SELECT IDX ,MEMBER_IDX ,PACKAGENAME ,STATE ,REWARD ,TXNUMBER ,TITLE ,REGISTDATE AS playdate FROM PLAYDATA WHERE MEMBER_IDX = #{member_idx} AND ( REGISTDATE >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURDATE()) * 1000 AND REGISTDATE < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)) * 1000) ORDER BY REWARD DESC

SELECT IFNULL(PLD.PACKAGENAME, MTS.SOURCENAME) AS PACKAGENAME ,MTP.AMOUNT AS REWARD ,PLD.ALTTITLE AS ALTTITLE ,IFNULL(PLD.STATE,'P001002') AS STATE ,IFNULL(PLD.PLAYTIME, '0') AS PLAYTIME ,MTP.REGISTDATE AS REGISTDATE ,IFNULL(PLD.MODIFYDATE, MTP.REGISTDATE) AS MODIFYDATE FROM MTPHISTORY MTP LEFT OUTER JOIN PLAYDATA PLD ON MTP.PLAYDATA_IDX = PLD.IDX , MTPSOURCE MTS WHERE MTP.MEMBER_IDX = #{member_idx} AND MTS.IDX = MTP.MTPSOURCE_IDX AND MTP.SEQUENCE = 1
